actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain spouses of military personnel to deduct payments into retirement savings to the extent that such payments do not exceed $900 for a taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain unemployed spouses of military personnel a $900 income tax deduction for payments into retirement savings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain spouses of military personnel to deduct payments into retirement savings to the extent that such payments do not exceed $900 for a taxable year.
